price: Kuma ba Mu sanya dawwama ga wani mutum ba, a gabãninka. Shin to idan ka mutu to sũ ne madawwama?
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ ٱلۡخُلۡدَۖ أَفَإِيْن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnā libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khālidūna
